response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, we're extending an exclusive offer for you today. We're confident it's worth more than what you perceive its value to be, but we understand everyone has their own valuation. For this special opportunity, we're offering it to you for $100. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.", "product_price": 100}
